Oh, Dead by Daylight, where have you been all my life?

I recommend this game if you're playing with friends.

I have an intense love/hate relationship with Dead by Daylight, and I feel as though I've logged enough hours into it to write a fair review. If you're just here wondering if the community is as toxic as everyone says it is ... well, yes, it is. I wouldn't say it's any more or less toxic than the communities you'd find in CS:GO, Overwatch, Fortnite, etc. ... but post-game chat can definitely frighten off a new player.

Que juego de mierda por dios es un generador de ira extremo; 
1. Los miles y millones de hits falsos, errores de hitbox, el deterioro chocandose contra el aire mismo, la hitbox de la cazadora de mierda, los killers pegandote de espaldas.
2.El juego esta menos balanceado que la mierda literalmente los survivors tienen todas las de ganar comparado a los killers patata que dan.
3.Depender en nenes de 8 que estan croucheando por todo el puto mapa con evacion urbana y se meten a un locker cada ves que escuchan un puto latido
4. Face campers y tuneleros en todas partes, literalmente no podes jugar 3 partidas de mierda seguidas sin encontrarte a un puto bubba que este facecampeando en basement a el pelotudo de tu equipo que quiso ir por el cofre.
5.Encontrar una partida es eterno literal el dia que estoy haciendo esta reseña estuve 30 minutos en queue con 2 amigos tratando de encontrar una puta partida de survivor, entramos y un puto doctor facecamper 
6. MMR de mierda te empareja contra 4 rangos rojos y vos siendo rango ceniza, o estas con 2 amigos rango rojo y te empareja con un bot de rango ceniza y bueno... le falla todas las skill checks y se mete en un locker cada 20 segundos.


Bueno en definitiva este juego es una mierda y espero que se funda

2/10

all together it isnt a bad game, and is very fun to play. unfortunately there are some downsides to playing. The Devs of the game are slow to fix bugs within the game because of the speghetti  coding the game uses, and the game isnt very balanced when it comes to the survive with friends feature and ranking in the game is a joke. The game also has a very slow player progression system for new players, because of this it may seem to new players that you have to end up buying players just to run the perks you want from them on your favorite character. despite these flaws the game is fun to play and has very little competition in the genre.
Bad game

When I first saw game play of this game. I was shook. I do not like violence, blood, and gore, so this game did not check off any boxes. I was frightened. However, upon watching more of my friends playing, I eventually grew fond of the cat and mouse game concept. In addition, I ended up watching some H2ODelirious videos and had lots of fun watching him play with friends. I was stuck in China at that time and it took 7 hours to download on a virtual machine on my Mac only for it to not run. So I was very disappointed as a Mac Gamer...but fortunately my friends helped me find many ways to play like GeForce NOW. And now, I have my own PC that I can play on. This game is definitely a bit more sophisticated than it seems. I thought at first it was just running endlessly in circles without any sense of direction, but there's many patterns to each map and as a survivor main, you can outsmart the killer to prolong chases. So it was very fun to see that I can help my teammates by just surviving and wasting the killer's time. Now, I've kinda grown numb to the gore of this game..but still do not like watching horror movies..This is a game that does take good communication and can become very difficult playing solo. Definitely recommend playing with friends.

The game is a fun one to play with perhaps a full lobby of friends. Otherwise I would not recommend you to purchase it. It is addicting and fun at first, when you play it for the horror aspect of it, but soon enough the horror goes away and all you are left with is anxiety of when will the killer show up, and after you get used to it, you have to get used to the anxiety of "will it be a balanced and fun killer to play against or a a guy playing something meta with 4 unfair perks?" either that or "should i wait for Jonny to log in? or do I trust the 3 random players who have multiple hundreds of hours in this game and still have no idea how it works?". And also, you may want to get used to the usual "wtf, i pressed it, why didn't it go off?!" or "i finished that, why does it show as unfinished?!" yeah... the servers really suck on this one.
This game gives me serious stockholm syndrome. Kinda trash ngl, Its ok though ig.

just dont get yourself into it if you can't deal with people being toxic for no apearant reason because screw you that's why, on the other hand the game is quite fun to play solo as a killer or as a friend group surviving (because no person would want play survivor on themseleves willingly).
but again toxic ass players with addition of (some) people can't take a loss and will therefore blame anyone else but themselves, certain playstyles being definitly easier but not fun for the opposition, horrible damn monetization and balancing, accusations of tunneling / face camping / flashlight clicking / teabagging etc being thrown around in the endgame chat (not to mention the amount of deaththreats i have received) andcheating being a RAMPANT problem in high level games. make this game a lot LESS fun to play than it would be if everyone just keep a cool head while playing.
so all and all.
its good but it needs quite a lot help
